LanguageData.Deathclawhand.label: Deathclaw Hand
LanguageData.Deathclawhand.description: A specially treated limb of a dead deathclaw can be crafted into a glove that allows you to deal massive damage to enemies in close combat.
LanguageData.Deathclawhand.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Deathclawhand.tools.1.label: point
